channel.title: Eco-Disaster || 317 RSPS
channel.description:
[b]Eco-Disaster[/b]
Brand new project i have been working on for a few weeks and i decided to release to public few days ago! had a max of 10 players already! always 5+ players online as of now.
[b]Development Team[/b] Server Coder - Billy Forums Designer/Coder - Evolution Beta Bug Finders - Mrrevenge
Server Owner - Billy Server Co-Owner - NONE Server Head Mod - Mrrevenge Server Mods - Toadanator Server Admins - NONE
[b]Features:[/b] -2 Homes -4 currently fully working minigames including Barrows,Pest control,Tzhaar fightpits,Tzhaar jad,Warriors Guild. -Over 12 fully fuctional Bosses with correct animations including Full Godwars,King Black Dragon,Dagannoth Kings,Tormented Demons,Corporal Beast,Sea Troll Queen,Lakhrahnaz,Nomad,Giant Sea Snake,Avatar of Destruction. -100% pvp with flawless switching including Mage Bank,Varrock PK,Lava Crossing,Edgeville,Green Dragons. -25 Fully working Skills! (one including a pk skill!) -Fully Fuctional Donator system including Custom rank,Custom teleport with a custom zone. -100% ancients + Lunar + normal magic. -100% normal prayers + Ancient curses with correct animations. -New items including Dungeoneering items,Nex items,D claws ect.. -Spec weapons with 100% specials and animations!
[b]Pictures:[/b] [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/wa22kz.png[/img] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/11lj7dw.png[/img] [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/axjnzk.png[/img] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/20u644g.png[/img] [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/nn2xbn.png[/img] [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/2dc5vt3.png[/img] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/34evjnc.png[/img] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/2z6fmtd.png[/img] [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/fw0gnn.png[/img]
[b]Forums Link:[/b] WEBLCIENT ON FORUMS! [url=http://eco-disaster.forumotions.com/]http://eco-disaster.forumotions.com/[/url]
[b]Webclient[/b] [url=http://www.rspscoding.org/play/?server=Eco-Disaster]http://www.rspscoding.org/play/?server=Eco-Disaster[/url]
[b]Client Download:[/b] [url=http://uppit.com/kt836mpvptk2/Eco-Disaster_Client.rar]http://uppit.com/kt836mpvptk2/Eco-Disaster_Client.rar[/url]
[b]Client Download:[/b] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?iukfq12a6wc9vud]http://www.mediafire.com/?iukfq12a6wc9vud[/url]
I hope you choose Eco-Disaster and join now!

item.description:
@bowzer wrote:

Eco-Disaster

Brand new project i have been working on for a few weeks and i decided to release to public few days ago! had a max of 10 players already! always 5+ players online as of now.

Development Team
Server Coder - Billy
Forums Designer/Coder - Evolution
Beta Bug Finders - Mrrevenge

Server Owner - Billy
Server Co-Owner - NONE
Server Head Mod - Mrrevenge
Server Mods - Toadanator
Server Admins - NONE

Features:
-2 Homes
-4 currently fully working minigames including Barrows,Pest control,Tzhaar fightpits,Tzhaar jad,Warriors Guild.
-Over 12 fully fuctional Bosses with correct animations including Full Godwars,King Black Dragon,Dagannoth Kings,Tormented Demons,Corporal Beast,Sea Troll Queen,Lakhrahnaz,Nomad,Giant Sea Snake,Avatar of Destruction.
-100% pvp with flawless switching including Mage Bank,Varrock PK,Lava Crossing,Edgeville,Green Dragons.
-25 Fully working Skills! (one including a pk skill!)
-Fully Fuctional Donator system including Custom rank,Custom teleport with a custom zone.
-100% ancients + Lunar + normal magic.
-100% normal prayers + Ancient curses with correct animations.
-New items including Dungeoneering items,Nex items,D claws ect…
-Spec weapons with 100% specials and animations!
